name: Area 55
description:
Uncover the mystery of Area 55, by flying your test rocket through the facility.
Are you the one to find the Secret Level?
 Keys:

Space = boost 
A = rotate left
D = rotate right
R = Restart Game

Credits:

VFX: NOMINAL - freesound.org

Explosion: MGWSoundDesign - Unity Asset Store

Music: The Indie Devs Nation   - Unity Asset Store

Tutorial: https://www.gamedev.tv/
